GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v5.15.91
GSD.description:
HID: betop: check shape of output reports

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.91 by commit 1a2a47b85cab50a3c146731bfeaf2d860f5344ee, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 52cd7785f3cdd2724f4efb5b21dbc75d6f9ccef4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: betop: check shape of output reports
